`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<dependencies>
    <!-- spring -->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-webmvc</artifactId>
        <version>5.3.9</version>
    </dependency>
    <!-- spring\u6570\u636E\u5E93-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-jdbc</artifactId>
        <version>5.3.9</version>
    </dependency>
    <!--aspectJ AOP \u7EC7\u5165\u5668-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.aspectj</groupId>
        <artifactId>aspectjweaver</artifactId>
        <version>1.9.7</version>
        <scope>runtime</scope>
    </dependency>
    <!--\u4E8B\u52A1\u7BA1\u7406\u5668-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-tx</artifactId>
        <version>5.3.8</version>
    </dependency>
    <!--mybatis-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.mybatis</groupId>
        <artifactId>mybatis</artifactId>
        <version>3.5.7</version>
    </dependency>
    <!--mybatis-spring\u6574\u5408\u5305-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.mybatis</groupId>
        <artifactId>mybatis-spring</artifactId>
        <version>2.0.6</version>
    </dependency>
    <!--mysql-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>mysql</groupId>
        <artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId>
        <version>8.0.21</version>
    </dependency>
    <!--junit-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>junit</groupId>
        <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
        <version>4.12</version>
        <scope>test</scope>
    </dependency>
    <!--lombok-->
    <dependency>
        <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
        <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
        <version>1.18.20</version>
        <scope>provided</scope>
    </dependency>
</dependencies>

<!--\u914D\u7F6EMaven\u9759\u6001\u8D44\u6E90\u8FC7\u6EE4\u95EE\u9898-->
<build>
    <resources>
        <resource>
            <directory>src/main/resources</directory>
            <includes>
                <include>**/*.properties</include>
                <include>**/*.xml</include>
            </includes>
            <filtering>true</filtering>
        </resource>
        <resource>
            <directory>src/main/java</directory>
            <includes>
                <include>**/*.properties</include>
                <include>**/*.xml</include>
            </includes>
            <filtering>true</filtering>
        </resource>
    </resources>
</build>

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
      xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
      xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans
       http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd">

   <!--bean\u5C31\u662Fjava\u5BF9\u8C61 , \u7531Spring\u521B\u5EFA\u548C\u7BA1\u7406-->
   <bean id="hello" class="com.kuang.pojo.Hello">
       <property name="name" value="Spring"/>
   </bean>
    
    <bean id="ServiceImpl" class="com.kuang.service.impl.UserServiceImpl">
        <!--\u6CE8\u610F: \u8FD9\u91CC\u7684name\u5E76\u4E0D\u662F\u5C5E\u6027 , \u800C\u662Fset\u65B9\u6CD5\u540E\u9762\u7684\u90A3\u90E8\u5206 , \u9996\u5B57\u6BCD\u5C0F\u5199-->
        <!--\u5F15\u7528\u53E6\u5916\u4E00\u4E2Abean , \u4E0D\u662F\u7528value \u800C\u662F\u7528 ref-->
        <property name="userDao" ref="OracleImpl"/>
   </bean>

</beans>

   //\u89E3\u6790beans.xml\u6587\u4EF6 , \u751F\u6210\u7BA1\u7406\u76F8\u5E94\u7684Bean\u5BF9\u8C61

   //getBean : \u53C2\u6570\u5373\u4E3Aspring\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6\u4E2Dbean\u7684id .
   Hello hello = (Hello) context.getBean("hello");
   hello.show();

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`@Test
public void test(){
    //\u521D\u59CB\u6216Spring\u5BB9\u5668\uFF0C\u52A0\u8F7D\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6\u3010\u4E0D\u5EFA\u8BAE\u4F7F\u7528\uFF0C\u5DF2\u5E9F\u5F03\u3011
    //\u9700\u8981\u63D0\u4F9BXML\u6587\u4EF6\u7EDD\u5BF9\u8DEF\u5F84
    BeanFactory beanFactory = new XmlBeanFactory(new FileSystemResource("E:\\\\Desktop\\\\IdeaTest\\\\Spring\\\\src\\\\main\\\\resources\\\\beans.xml"));
    //\u901A\u8FC7\u5BB9\u5668\u83B7\u53D6\u5B9E\u4F8B
    UserMapper mapper = beanFactory.getBean("UserMapper",UserMapper.class);
    List<User> user = mapper.selectUser();
    System.out.println(user);
}

public void test1(){
    //1\u3001\u521D\u59CB\u6216Spring\u5BB9\u5668\uFF0C\u52A0\u8F7D\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6

    //2\u3001\u901A\u8FC7\u5BB9\u5668\u83B7\u53D6\u5B9E\u4F8B
    UserMapper mapper = context.getBean("UserMapper",UserMapper.class);
    List<User> user = mapper.selectUser();
    System.out.println(user);
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<context-param>
    <!--\u52A0\u8F7Dsrc\u6587\u4EF6\u76EE\u5F55\u4E0B\u7684XML\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6-->
    <param-name>contextConfigLocation</param-name>
    <param-value>classpath:beans.xml</param-value>
</context-param>
<!--\u6307\u5B9AContextLoaderListener \u65B9\u5F0F\u542F\u52A8Spring\u5BB9\u5668-->
<listener>

\u7136\u540EServiceImpl\u6258\u7BA1\u7ED9Spring\uFF0C\u8BA9Spring\u521B\u5EFA\u5176\u5BF9\u8C61\uFF0C\u540C\u65F6\u6784\u9020\u65B9\u6CD5\u4F20\u9012\u5B9E\u53C2\u3002`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/Java/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-29b7ee21-ba2c-4343-80fa-e089e39622bf.mdx",lineNumber:336,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<!--\u6307\u5B9ADaoImpl\u914D\u7F6E\u7ED9Spring\uFF0C\u8BA9Spring\u521B\u5EFA\u5B9E\u4F8B-->
<bean id="DaoImpl" class="com.huang.dao.UserDaoImpl"/>
<!--\u6307\u5B9AServiceImpl\u914D\u7F6E\u7ED9Spring\uFF0C\u8BA9Spring\u521B\u5EFA\u5B9E\u4F8B-->
<bean id="ServiceImpl" class="com.huang.service.UserServiceImpl">
    <!--\u4F7F\u7528\u6784\u9020\u65B9\u6CD5\u6CE8\u5165\u5C5E\u6027-->
    <!-- \u7B2C\u4E00\u79CD\u6839\u636Eindex\u53C2\u6570\u4E0B\u6807\u8BBE\u7F6E -->
    <constructor-arg index="0" ref="DaoImpl"/>
</bean>

<!-- \u7B2C\u4E8C\u79CD\u6839\u636E\u53C2\u6570\u540D\u5B57\u8BBE\u7F6E -->
<bean id="ServiceImpl" class="com.huang.service.UserServiceImpl">
   <!-- name\u6307\u53C2\u6570\u540D -->
   <constructor-arg name="userDao" ref="DaoImpl"/>
</bean>

<!-- \u7B2C\u4E09\u79CD\u6839\u636E\u53C2\u6570\u7C7B\u578B\u8BBE\u7F6E \u4E0D\u63A8\u8350\uFF01\uFF01-->
<bean id="ServiceImpl" class="com.huang.service.UserServiceImpl">
   <constructor-arg type="com.huang.dao.UserDao" ref="DaoImpl"/>
</bean>

// \u76F8\u5F53\u4E8E\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6\u4E2D <bean id="user" class="\u5F53\u524D\u6CE8\u89E3\u7684\u7C7B"/>
public class User {
   @Value("\u79E6\u7586")
   // \u76F8\u5F53\u4E8E\u914D\u7F6E\u6587\u4EF6\u4E2D <property name="name" value="\u79E6\u7586"/>
   public String name;
    //1\u3001\u53EF\u4EE5\u4E0D\u7528\u63D0\u4F9Bset\u65B9\u6CD5\uFF0C\u76F4\u63A5\u5728\u76F4\u63A5\u540D\u4E0A\u6DFB\u52A0@value("\u503C")

    @Value("\u79E6\u7586")
   public void setName(String name) {
       this.name = name;
  }
}

public class MyConfig {
   @Bean //\u901A\u8FC7\u65B9\u6CD5\u6CE8\u518C\u4E00\u4E2Abean\uFF0C\u8FD9\u91CC\u7684\u8FD4\u56DE\u503C\u5C31Bean\u7684\u7C7B\u578B\uFF0C\u65B9\u6CD5\u540D\u5C31\u662Fbean\u7684id\uFF01
   public Dog dog(){
       return new Dog();

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`//\u4EE3\u7406\u89D2\u8272\uFF1A\u4E2D\u4ECB
public class Proxy implements Rent {
   private Host host;
   public Proxy() { }
   public Proxy(Host host) {
       this.host = host;
  }

   //\u79DF\u623F
   public void rent(){
       seeHouse();
       host.rent();
       fare();
  }
   //\u770B\u623F
   public void seeHouse(){
       System.out.println("\u5E26\u623F\u5BA2\u770B\u623F");
  }
   //\u6536\u4E2D\u4ECB\u8D39
   public void fare(){
       System.out.println("\u6536\u4E2D\u4ECB\u8D39");
  }
}

       Host host = new Host();
       //\u4E2D\u4ECB\u5E2E\u52A9\u623F\u4E1C

}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`public class ProxyInvocationHandler implements InvocationHandler {
    //\u88AB\u4EE3\u7406\u7684\u63A5\u53E3
    private TestDao testDao;
    public void setTestDao(TestDao testDao) {
        this.testDao = testDao;
    }

    //\u751F\u6210\u4EE3\u7406\u7C7B
    public Object getProxy(){
        //\u53C2\u6570\uFF1A1\u3001\u7C7B\u52A0\u8F7D\u5668 2\u3001\u88AB\u4EE3\u7406\u5BF9\u8C61\u5B9E\u73B0\u7684\u6240\u6709\u63A5\u53E3  3\u3001InvocationHandler
        return Proxy.newProxyInstance(this.getClass().getClassLoader(), testDao.getClass().getInterfaces(),this);
    }

    /**
      * \u5904\u7406\u4EE3\u7406\u5B9E\u4F8B\uFF0C\u5E76\u8FD4\u56DE\u7ED3\u679C
      * proxy \uFF1A\u88AB\u4EE3\u7406\u5BF9\u8C61
	  * method \uFF1A\u5C06\u8981\u88AB\u6267\u884C\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5
	  * args \uFF1A\u6267\u884C\u65B9\u6CD5\u662F\u9700\u8981\u7684\u53C2\u6570
	  */
    @Override
    public Object invoke(Object proxy, Method method, Object[] args) throws Throwable {
        //\u521B\u5EFA\u5207\u9762
        MyAspect myAspect = new MyAspect();
        //\u524D\u589E\u5F3A
        myAspect.check();

        //\u52A8\u6001\u4EE3\u7406\u7684\u672C\u8D28\u5C31\u662F\u901A\u8FC7\u53CD\u5C04\u673A\u5236\u5B9E\u73B0\uFF01
        Object result = method.invoke(testDao,args);

        //\u540E\u589E\u5F3A
        myAspect.except();

        return result;
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`public class DynamicTest {
    @Test
    public void Test(){
        //\u521B\u5EFA\u4EE3\u7406\u5BF9\u8C61
        ProxyInvocationHandler pih = new ProxyInvocationHandler();
        //\u521B\u5EFA\u76EE\u6807\u5BF9\u8C61
        TestDao testDao = new TestDaoImpl();
        //\u8BBE\u7F6E\u8981\u4EE3\u7406\u7684\u5BF9\u8C61 \u4EE3\u7406\u7684\u662F\u63A5\u53E3
        pih.setTestDao(testDao);
        //\u52A8\u6001\u751F\u6210\u4EE3\u7406\u7C7B\uFF01
        TestDao proxy = (TestDao) pih.getProxy();
        //\u6267\u884C\u65B9\u6CD5
        proxy.save();
        System.out.println("===================");
        proxy.modify();
        System.out.println("===================");
        proxy.delete();
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`public class CglibDynamicProxy implements MethodInterceptor {
    //\u751F\u6210\u4EE3\u7406\u7C7B target:\u76EE\u6807\u5BF9\u8C61\uFF0C\u9700\u8981\u589E\u5F3A\u7684\u5BF9\u8C61
    public Object getProxy(Object target){
        //\u521B\u5EFA\u4E00\u4E2A\u52A8\u6001\u7C7B\u5BF9\u8C61\uFF0C\u5373\u589E\u5F3A\u7C7B\u5BF9\u8C61\u3002\u8BBE\u7F6E\u5176\u7236\u7C7B\u5373\u8981\u589E\u5F3A\u7684\u5BF9\u8C61
        Enhancer enhancer = new Enhancer();
        enhancer.setSuperclass(target.getClass());
        //\u786E\u5B9A\u4EE3\u7406\u903B\u8F91\u5BF9\u8C61\u4E3A\u5F53\u524D\u5BF9\u8C61\uFF0C\u8981\u6C42\u5F53\u524D\u5BF9\u8C61\u5B9E\u73B0MethodInterceptor\u63A5\u53E3
        enhancer.setCallback(this);
        return enhancer.create();
    }

    /**
     * intercept \u65B9\u6CD5\u4F1A\u5728\u7A0B\u5E8F\u6267\u884C\u76EE\u6807\u65B9\u6CD5\u662F\u88AB\u8C03\u7528
     * @param object \u6839\u636E\u6307\u5B9A\u7236\u7C7B\u751F\u6210\u7684\u4EE3\u7406\u5BF9\u8C61
     * @param method \u62E6\u622A\u65B9\u6CD5
     * @param args \u53C2\u6570\u6570\u7EC4
     * @param methodProxy \u65B9\u6CD5\u7684\u4EE3\u7406\u5BF9\u8C61 \u7528\u4E8E\u6267\u884C\u7236\u7C7B\u65B9\u6CD5
     * @return \u8FD4\u56DE\u4EE3\u7406\u7ED3\u679C
     * @throws Throwable
     */
    @Override
    public Object intercept(Object object, Method method, Object[] args, MethodProxy methodProxy) throws Throwable {
        //\u521B\u5EFA\u5207\u9762
        MyAspect myAspect = new MyAspect();
        myAspect.check();
        //\u76EE\u6807\u65B9\u6CD5\u6267\u884C
        Object obj = methodProxy.invokeSuper(object,args);
        
        myAspect.except();
        return obj;
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`public void Test2(){
    //\u521B\u5EFA\u4EE3\u7406\u5BF9\u8C61
    CglibDynamicProxy cdp = new CglibDynamicProxy();
    //\u521B\u5EFA\u76EE\u6807\u5BF9\u8C61
    TestDao testDao= new TestDao();
    //\u52A8\u6001\u751F\u6210\u4EE3\u7406\u7C7B\uFF01
    TestDao proxy = (TestDao) cdp.getProxy(testDao);
    //\u6267\u884C\u65B9\u6CD5
    proxy.save();
    System.out.println("===================");
    proxy.modify();
    System.out.println("===================");
    proxy.delete();
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`public class LoggingInterceptor implements MethodInterceptor {
    @Override
    public Object invoke(MethodInvocation invocation) throws Throwable {
        Object[] args = invocation.getArguments();

        String date1 = (new Date()).toLocaleString(); System.out.println("Interceptor \u4FE1\u606F\uFF1A[logging before ][" + date1
                + "]\u7528\u6237 " + args[0] + " \u5C1D\u8BD5\u4FEE\u6539\u4E2A\u4EBA\u4FE1\u606F...");

        Object returnObject = invocation.proceed();

        String date2 = (new Date()).toLocaleString(); System.out.println("Interceptor \u4FE1\u606F\uFF1A[logging after ]["+date2
                +"]\u7528\u6237 "+args[0]+" \u6210\u529F\u4FEE\u6539\u4E2A\u4EBA\u4FE1\u606F...");

        return args;
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<!--target\u76EE\u6807-->
<bean id="userService" class="cn.edu.zjut.service.UserService" />

<!-- \u589E\u5F3A\u5904\u7406\u5B9A\u4E49 -->
<bean id="logInterceptor" class="cn.edu.zjut.advice.LoggingInterceptor" />

<!--\u8BBE\u5B9A\u4EE3\u7406-->
<bean id="logProxy"  class="org.springframework.aop.framework.ProxyFactoryBean">
    <!--\u8BBE\u5B9A\u4EE3\u7406\u7684\u662F\u63A5\u53E3-->
    <property name="proxyInterfaces">
        <value>cn.edu.zjut.service.IUserService</value>
    </property>
    <!--\u8BBE\u5B9A\u4EE3\u7406\u7684\u76EE\u6807\u7C7B-->
    <property name="target">
        <ref bean="userService"/>
    </property>

    <!--\u8BBE\u5B9A\u5207\u5165\u7684 Advice-->
    <property name="interceptorNames">
        <list>
            <value>logInterceptor</value>
        </list>
    </property>
</bean>

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang;

import org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint;
import org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint;

public class MyAspect {
    //\u524D\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5
    public void before(JoinPoint jp){
        System.out.print("\u524D\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5: ");
        System.out.println("\u76EE\u6807\u7C7B\u5BF9\u8C61\uFF1A"+jp.getTarget()+" \u88AB\u589E\u5F3A\u5904\u7406\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\uFF1A"+jp.getSignature().getName());
    }
    //\u540E\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5
    public void afterReturning(JoinPoint jp){
        System.out.print("\u540E\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5: ");
        System.out.println(" \u88AB\u589E\u5F3A\u5904\u7406\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\uFF1A"+jp.getSignature().getName());
    }

    /**\u73AF\u7ED5\u901A\u77E5
     * ProceedingJoinPoint\u662FJoinPoint\u7684\u5B50\u63A5\u53E3 \u4EE3\u8868\u53EF\u4EE5\u6267\u884C\u7684\u76EE\u6807\u65B9\u6CD5
     * @return \u5FC5\u987B\u8FD4\u56DEObject
     * @throws Throwable
     */
    public Object around(ProceedingJoinPoint pjp) throws Throwable {
        System.out.println("\u73AF\u7ED5\u5F00\u59CB");
        Object obj = pjp.proceed();
        System.out.println("\u73AF\u7ED5\u7ED3\u675F");
        return obj;
    }
    //\u5F02\u5E38\u901A\u77E5
    public void except(Throwable e){
        System.out.println("\u5F02\u5E38\u901A\u77E5\uFF1A \u7A0B\u5E8F\u6267\u884C\u5F02\u5E38"+e.getMessage());
    }
    //\u6700\u7EC8\u901A\u77E5
    public void after(){
        System.out.println("\u6700\u7EC8\u901A\u77E5");
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop https://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd">

    <!--\u5B9A\u4E49\u76EE\u6807\u5BF9\u8C61-->
    <bean id="testDao" class="com.huang.TestDaoImpl"/>
    <!--\u5B9A\u4E49\u5207\u9762\u7C7B-->
    <bean id="MyAspect" class="com.huang.MyAspect"/>
    <!--AOP\u914D\u7F6E-->
    <aop:config>
        <!--\u5207\u9762-->
        <aop:aspect ref="MyAspect">
      <!--\u5207\u5165\u70B9 expression:\u901A\u77E5\u589E\u5F3A\u54EA\u4E9B\u65B9\u6CD5 execution(\u8BBF\u95EE\u4FEE\u9970\u7B26 \u8FD4\u56DE\u503C\u7C7B\u578B \u5305\u8DEF\u5F84\u540D.\u7C7B\u540D.\u65B9\u6CD5\u540D(\u2026) \u5F02\u5E38)-->
            <aop:pointcut id="pointcut" expression="execution(* com.huang.*.*(..))"/>
            <aop:before method="before" pointcut-ref="pointcut"/>
            <aop:after-returning method="afterReturning" pointcut-ref="pointcut"/>
            <aop:around method="around" pointcut-ref="pointcut"/>
            <aop:after-throwing method="except" pointcut-ref="pointcut" throwing="e"/>
            <aop:after method="after" pointcut-ref="pointcut"/>
        </aop:aspect>
    </aop:config>
</beans>

     * Object : \u76EE\u6807\u5BF9\u8C61
     */
    @Override
    public void before(Method method, Object[] objects, Object o) throws Throwable {
        System.out.print("\u524D\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5: ");
        System.out.println("\u76EE\u6807\u7C7B\u5BF9\u8C61\uFF1A"+o.getClass().getName()+" \u88AB\u589E\u5F3A\u5904\u7406\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\uFF1A"+method.getName());
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`import org.springframework.aop.AfterReturningAdvice;
import java.lang.reflect.Method;

public class AfterLog implements AfterReturningAdvice {
    /**
     * returnValue \u8FD4\u56DE\u503C
     * method\u88AB\u8C03\u7528\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5
     * args \u88AB\u8C03\u7528\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\u7684\u5BF9\u8C61\u7684\u53C2\u6570
     * target \u88AB\u8C03\u7528\u7684\u76EE\u6807\u5BF9\u8C61
     */
    @Override
    public void afterReturning(Object returnValue, Method method, Object[] args, Object target) throws Throwable {
        System.out.print("\u540E\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5: ");
        System.out.println("\u6267\u884C\u4E86" + target.getClass().getName()
                +"\u7684"+method.getName()+"\u65B9\u6CD5,"
                +"\u8FD4\u56DE\u503C\uFF1A"+returnValue);
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:aop="http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/aop https://www.springframework.org/schema/aop/spring-aop.xsd">

    <!--\u5B9A\u4E49\u76EE\u6807\u5BF9\u8C61-->
    <bean id="testDao" class="com.huang.TestDaoImpl"/>
    <!--\u5B9A\u4E49\u901A\u77E5\u7C7B-->
    <bean id="Log" class="com.huang.Log"/>
    <bean id="AfterLog" class="com.huang.AfterLog"/>
    <!--AOP\u914D\u7F6E-->
    <aop:config>
        <aop:pointcut id="pointcut" expression="execution(* com.huang.*.*(..))"/>
        <aop:advisor advice-ref="Log" pointcut-ref="pointcut"/>
        <aop:advisor advice-ref="AfterLog" pointcut-ref="pointcut"/>
    </aop:config>
</beans>

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang;

import org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint;
import org.aspectj.lang.ProceedingJoinPoint;
import org.aspectj.lang.annotation.*;
import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;

@Aspect
@Component
public class MyAspectAnnotation {
    @Pointcut("execution(* com.huang.*.*(..))")   //\u5207\u5165\u70B9
    private void pointcut(){}

    @Before("pointcut()")//\u524D\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5 <aop:before method="before" pointcut-ref="pointcut"/>
    public void before(JoinPoint jp){
        System.out.print("\u524D\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5: ");
        System.out.println("\u76EE\u6807\u7C7B\u5BF9\u8C61\uFF1A"+jp.getTarget()+" \u88AB\u589E\u5F3A\u5904\u7406\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\uFF1A"+jp.getSignature().getName());
    }

    @AfterReturning("pointcut()")//\u540E\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5
    public void afterReturning(JoinPoint jp){
        System.out.print("\u540E\u7F6E\u901A\u77E5: ");
        System.out.println(" \u88AB\u589E\u5F3A\u5904\u7406\u7684\u65B9\u6CD5\uFF1A"+jp.getSignature().getName());
    }

    @Around("pointcut()") //\u73AF\u7ED5\u901A\u77E5
    public Object around(ProceedingJoinPoint pjp) throws Throwable {
        System.out.println("\u73AF\u7ED5\u5F00\u59CB");
        Object obj = pjp.proceed();
        System.out.println("\u73AF\u7ED5\u7ED3\u675F");
        return obj;
    }

    @AfterThrowing(value = "pointcut()",throwing = "e")//\u5F02\u5E38\u901A\u77E5
    public void except(Throwable e){
        System.out.println("\u5F02\u5E38\u901A\u77E5\uFF1A \u7A0B\u5E8F\u6267\u884C\u5F02\u5E38"+e.getMessage());
    }

    @After("pointcut()")//\u6700\u7EC8\u901A\u77E5
    public void after(){
        System.out.println("\u6700\u7EC8\u901A\u77E5");
    }

}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<!--\u6307\u5B9A\u626B\u63CF\u5305\uFF0C\u6CE8\u89E3\u751F\u6548-->
<context:component-scan base-package="com.huang"/>

<!--\u914D\u7F6E\u6570\u636E\u5E93-->
<bean id="dataSource" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DriverManagerDataSource">
    <property name="driverClassName" value="com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver"/>
        <property name="url" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/yiyu?useSSL=true&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf8&serverTimezone=UTC"/>
    <property name="username" value="root"/>
    <property name="password" value="123456"/>
</bean>

<!--\u914D\u7F6EJDBC\u6A21\u677F-->
<bean id="jdbcTemplate" class="org.springframework.jdbc.core.JdbcTemplate">
    <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
</bean>

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`@Repository("testDao")
public class TestDaoImpl implements TestDao{
    @Autowired
    private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

    @Override
    public List<login> query(String sql, Object[] param) {
        RowMapper<login> rowMapper = new BeanPropertyRowMapper<login>(login.class);
        return jdbcTemplate.query(sql,rowMapper,param);
    }
}

    for(login i:list) System.out.println(i);
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`@Repository("TestDaoImpl")
public class TestDaoImpl {
    @Autowired
    private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

    @Autowired
    private DataSourceTransactionManager txManager;

    public String test(){
        //\u9ED8\u8BA4\u4E8B\u52A1\u5B9A\u4E49
        TransactionDefinition tf = new DefaultTransactionDefinition();
        //\u5F00\u542F\u4E8B\u52A1ts
        TransactionStatus ts = txManager.getTransaction(tf);
        String message = "\u6267\u884C\u6210\u529F";
        try {
            String sql = "insert into login value(?,?)";
            Object param[] = {"hhw","123"};
            jdbcTemplate.update(sql,param);
            //\u91CD\u590D\u63D2\u5165\uFF0C\u4E3B\u952E\u91CD\u590D
            jdbcTemplate.update(sql,param);
            //\u63D0\u4EA4\u4E8B\u52A1
            txManager.commit(ts);
        }catch (Exception e){
            //\u51FA\u73B0\u5F02\u5E38\uFF0C\u4E8B\u52A1\u56DE\u6EDA
            txManager.rollback(ts);
            message="\u4E8B\u52A1\u56DE\u6EDA";
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return message;
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<!--\u4E3A\u6570\u636E\u6E90\u6DFB\u52A0\u4E8B\u52A1\u7BA1\u7406\u5668-->

</bean>

    <property name="transactionManager" ref="txManager"/>
</bean>

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`@Repository("TestDaoImpl")
public class TestDaoImpl {
    @Autowired
    private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

    @Autowired
    private TransactionTemplate transactionTemplate;
    
    String message = "";
    public String test(){
        //\u4EE5\u533F\u540D\u5185\u90E8\u7C7B\u7684\u65B9\u5F0F\u5B9E\u73B0TransactionCallback\u63A5\u53E3\uFF0C\u4F7F\u7528\u9ED8\u8BA4\u7684\u4E8B\u52A1\u63D0\u4EA4\u548C\u56DE\u6EDA\u89C4\u5219
        transactionTemplate.execute(new TransactionCallback<Object>() {
            @Override
            public Object doInTransaction(TransactionStatus transactionStatus) {
                String sql = "insert into login value(?,?)";
                Object param[] = {"hhw","123"};
                try{
                    jdbcTemplate.update(sql,param);
                    //\u91CD\u590D\u63D2\u5165\uFF0C\u4E3B\u952E\u91CD\u590D
                    jdbcTemplate.update(sql,param);
                    message="\u6267\u884C\u6210\u529F";
                }catch (Exception e){
                    message="\u4E8B\u52A1\u56DE\u6EDA";
                    e.printStackTrace();
                }
                return message;
            }
        });
        return message;
    }
}

public class TestController {
    @Autowired
    private TestDao testDao;

    public String test(){
        String sql = "insert into login value(?,?)";
        Object param[] = {"hhw","123"};
        String message = "\u6267\u884C\u6210\u529F";
        try {
            testDao.update(sql,param);
            //\u91CD\u590D\u63D2\u5165\uFF0C\u4E3B\u952E\u91CD\u590D
            testDao.update(sql,param);
        }catch (Exception e){
            message="\u4E8B\u52A1\u56DE\u6EDA";
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return message;
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<!--\u7F16\u5199\u901A\u77E5\u58F0\u660E\u4E8B\u52A1-->
<tx:advice id="txAdvice" transaction-manager="txManager">
    <tx:attributes>
        <!--*\u8868\u793A\u4EFB\u610F\u65B9\u6CD5 \u914D\u7F6E\u54EA\u4E9B\u65B9\u6CD5\u4F7F\u7528\u4EC0\u4E48\u6837\u7684\u4E8B\u52A1,\u914D\u7F6E\u4E8B\u52A1\u7684\u4F20\u64AD\u7279\u6027-->
        <tx:method name="update" propagation="REQUIRED"/>
        <tx:method name="*" propagation="REQUIRED"/>
    </tx:attributes>
</tx:advice>

<!--\u7F16\u5199AOP\uFF0C\u8BA9Spring \u81EA\u52A8\u5BF9\u76EE\u6807\u5BF9\u8C61\u751F\u6210\u4EE3\u7406\uFF0C\u9700\u8981\u4F7F\u7528AspectJ\u8868\u8FBE\u5F0F-->
<aop:config>
    <!--\u5B9A\u4E49\u5207\u5165\u70B9-->
    <aop:pointcut id="txPointcut" expression="execution(* com.huang.dao.*.*(..))"/>
    <!--\u5207\u9762\uFF1A\u5C06\u5207\u5165\u70B9\u4E0E\u901A\u77E5\u7BA1\u7406-->
    <aop:advisor advice-ref="txAdvice" pointcut-ref="txPointcut"/>
</aop:config>

//\u52A0\u4E0A@Transactional\u6CE8\u89E3\u5C31\u53EF\u4EE5\u6307\u5B9A\u8FD9\u4E2A\u7C7B\u53D7Spring\u7684\u4E8B\u52A1\u7BA1\u7406

public class TestDaoImpl implements TestDao {
    @Autowired
    private JdbcTemplate jdbcTemplate;

    @Override
    public int update(String sql, Object[] param) {
        return jdbcTemplate.update(sql,param);

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:["\u4F7F\u7528spring\u914D\u7F6E",(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"beans.xml"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/Java/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-29b7ee21-ba2c-4343-80fa-e089e39622bf.mdx",lineNumber:1824,columnNumber:15},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/heavenmei/Desktop/heavenmei.io/content/note/Java/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-29b7ee21-ba2c-4343-80fa-e089e39622bf.mdx",lineNumber:1824,columnNumber:5},this),`
`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd">
    <!--dataSource \u914D\u7F6E\u6570\u636E\u6E90\uFF1A\u6570\u636E\u6E90\u6709\u975E\u5E38\u591A\uFF0C\u53EF\u4EE5\u4F7F\u7528\u7B2C\u4E09\u65B9\u7684\uFF0C\u4E5F\u53EF\u4F7F\u4F7F\u7528Spring\u7684-->
    <bean id="dataSource" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DriverManagerDataSource">
        <property name="driverClassName" value="com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver"/>
        <property name="url" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/yiyu?useSSL=true&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf8&serverTimezone=UTC"/>
        <property name="username" value="root"/>
        <property name="password" value="123456"/>
    </bean>
    <!--\u914D\u7F6ESqlSessionFactory-->
    <bean id="sqlSessionFactory" class="org.mybatis.spring.SqlSessionFactoryBean">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
        <property name="configLocation" value="classpath:mybatis-config.xml"/>
    </bean>
    <!--\u6CE8\u518CsqlSessionTemplate , \u5173\u8054sqlSessionFactory-->
    <bean id="sqlSession" class="org.mybatis.spring.SqlSessionTemplate">
        <constructor-arg index="0" ref="sqlSessionFactory"/>
    </bean>
    <!--\u6CE8\u518Cbean\u5B9E\u73B0\uFF0C\u5173\u8054sqlSession-->
    <bean id="UserMapper" class="com.huang.dao.UserMapperImpl">
        <property name="sqlSession" ref="sqlSession"/>
    </bean>

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"java","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`package com.huang.dao;

import com.huang.pojo.User;
import org.mybatis.spring.SqlSessionTemplate;

import java.util.List;

public class UserMapperImpl implements UserMapper{
    //sqlSession\u4E0D\u7528\u6211\u4EEC\u81EA\u5DF1\u521B\u5EFA\u4E86\uFF0CSpring\u6765\u7BA1\u7406
    private SqlSessionTemplate sqlSession;

    public void setSqlSession(SqlSessionTemplate sqlSession) {
        this.sqlSession = sqlSession;
    }

    public List<User> selectUser() {
        UserMapper mapper = sqlSession.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
        return mapper.selectUser();
    }
}

`,(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,e.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"xml","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF8"?>
<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"
       xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
       xmlns:context="http://www.springframework.org/schema/context"
       xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans.xsd http://www.springframework.org/schema/context https://www.springframework.org/schema/context/spring-context.xsd">

    <!--\u5F00\u542F\u6CE8\u89E3-->
    <context:component-scan base-package="com.huang"/>
    <!--dataSource \u914D\u7F6E\u6570\u636E\u6E90\uFF1A\u6570\u636E\u6E90\u6709\u975E\u5E38\u591A\uFF0C\u53EF\u4EE5\u4F7F\u7528\u7B2C\u4E09\u65B9\u7684\uFF0C\u4E5F\u53EF\u4F7F\u4F7F\u7528Spring\u7684-->
    <bean id="dataSource" class="org.springframework.jdbc.datasource.DriverManagerDataSource">
        <property name="driverClassName" value="com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver"/>
        <property name="url" value="jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/yiyu?useSSL=true&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf8&serverTimezone=UTC"/>
        <property name="username" value="root"/>
        <property name="password" value="123456"/>
    </bean>
    <!--\u914D\u7F6ESqlSessionFactory-->
    <bean id="sqlSessionFactory" class="org.mybatis.spring.SqlSessionFactoryBean">
        <property name="dataSource" ref="dataSource"/>
        <property name="configLocation" value="classpath:mybatis-config.xml"/>
    </bean>
   <!--Mapper\u4EE3\u7406\u5F00\u53D1\uFF0C\u4F7F\u7528Spring\u81EA\u52A8\u626B\u7801Mybatis\u63A5\u53E3\u5E76\u88C5\u914D-->
    <bean class="org.mybatis.spring.mapper.MapperScannerConfigurer">
        <property name="basePackage" value="com.huang.dao"/>
        <property name="sqlSessionFactoryBeanName" value="sqlSessionFactory"/>
    </bean>
</beans>
